flowRoot.flowPara: Execution dependency E guarantees A' happens-before B'
Submitting A, S, and B for execution, in that order, will result in execution dependency E and memory dependency m between A' and B'.
•Memory writes in a' are made available
•Available memory writes, including those from a' , are made visible to b'
All TRANSFER_WRITE memory accesses that occur in A'
All SHADER_READ memory accesses that occur in B'
